Interface SprintRepository

All Superinterfaces:

    • findByIdAndProjectOrThrow

      default Sprint findByIdAndProjectOrThrow(long id, Project project) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Finds sprint by ID and project.
      Parameters:
      id - sprint ID
      project - project
      Returns:
      sprint with given ID and project
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - thrown when sprint is not found or project is not equal to sprint project
